plot: An 80's Obsessed video store clerk dreams of becoming an Action star like his heroes. Despite constant ridicule, he embarks on training to become the 80's action master. He is given a chance to rise up and seizes the moment.
title: Action Supremo
plot_es: An 80's Obsessed video store clerk dreams of becoming an Action star like his heroes. Despite constant ridicule, he embarks on training to become the 80's action master. He is given a chance to rise up and seizes the moment.
plot_en: An 80's Obsessed video store clerk dreams of becoming an Action star like his heroes. Despite constant ridicule, he embarks on training to become the 80's action master. He is given a chance to rise up and seizes the moment.
